description: The financial assistance will help those returning for Christmas who need to self-isolate away from family.
title: Manx Solidarity Fund to help self-isolating students
title_page: Manx Solidarity Fund to help self-isolating students - BBC News
maintext: A spokesman for the fund, which was set up to support people who have been impacted by coronavirus restrictions, said applications would be verified together with the education department's grant team.
